title: This Week's Sky at a Glance, July 25 – August 3
description: The newly waxing Moon passes Mars low in the west, then Spica and Antares while growing more robust. At dawn, Jupiter heads toward Venus. The post This Week's Sky at a Glance, July 25 – August 3 appeared first on Sky & Telescope.
author: Alan MacRobert
categories: This Week's Sky At a Glance
This week's sky at a glance
